filters.description: Exact match - hides entries with key exactly 'LOGIN'
Wildcard match - hides entries matching pattern (e.g., '/Channels/ABC123/Connectors')
Prefix match - hides entries starting with 'temp/'
Contains match - hides entries containing 'debug' anywhere in the key

filterTypes.exact: Use exact key name to match (e.g., 'LOGIN')

_documentation.note: Only depth 0 filters are applied to top-level entries. Higher depth filters are for future use.
